entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:38 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
